education_text.0: Mukhanov has over 200 scientific publications including 3 book chapters, 141 reviewed articles and 41 conference papersMukhanov joined HYPRES as Chief Technical Officer in 1991 to initiate the development of      Rapid single flux quantum rapid single flux quantum (RSFQ) superconductor circuit technology,          which he invented in 1985 at      Moscow State University Moscow State University as a PhD student
